document_data.name: School of Augury
document_data.mainbody: The '''School of Augury''' was a [[wizard]]ly school located in the port city of [[Khaerbaal]] in [[Halruaa]].
document_data.Description: The school's many spires rose high above the city, visible from across Khaerbaal's various districts.
document_data.History: The School of Augury was established sometime before the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
